original_text: And he said to him, “If now I have found favor in your eyes, then show me a sign that it is you who speak with me.
korean_text: 기드온이 그에게 대답하되 만일 내가 주께 은혜를 얻었사오면 나와 말씀하신 이가 주 되시는 표징을 내게 보이소서

sentences.original_text: If now I have found favor in your eyes,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 당신의 눈에 은혜를 입었다면,

sentences.original_text: that it is you who speak with me.
